about_the_game:
As a government operative tasked with handling the most dangerous tasks, you must Shoot, Spy, Sneak, Sear and Sabotage your way to success.

2 Bit Operative has 4 Chapters.

Chapter 1. Get used to your role as a top secret Operative. Learn the skills you will need to save the world. Episode 1, Chapter 1 is a revisitation of the Demo, but with a twist!
Chapter 2. Go out into the world and crush those objectives. Dictator trying to destroy the free world? Neutralize them. Mad Scientist developing neurotoxins? Show him the error of his ways.
Chapter 3. Beyond the usual bad guys trying to destroy or take over the world there are threats more extraordinary in nature, both from beyond our world and from within! In Chapter 3, ET wants your home. You know what to do.
Chapter 4. Fresh back from kicking ET’s ass, you are now faced with [REDACTED]. Sorry soldier, you’re not cleared for this until you complete the first 3 chapters!


Skills, Weapons and Upgrades

  • Throwing Knives
  • Dual Pistols
  • Shot guns
  • Sniper Rifles
  • Lock Picks
  • Hacking Skills
  • Stealth
  • Alien weapons
  • Body Armor
  • Grenades
  • Stun guns

Features
  • Bombs to diffuse
  • Doors to pick
  • Destructible props
  • Traps to avoid
  • Puzzles to overcome
  • Thugs to defeat
  • Bombs to set off
  • Neurotoxins to release
  • Dictators to overthrow
  • Prisoners to rescue

Each mission has unique objectives. Can you complete them all?

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains pixelated blood spatter and death of 2-bit characters.
